msg.Canal01Text: Nanatsu no Taizai is an adaptation of the manga written and illustrated by Nakaba Suzuki. It began serializing in Kodansha's Weekly Shōnen Magazine in October 2012, tankōbon released so far.
msg.Canal02Text: A humble young man discovers a magic lamp with a genius who can grant him wishes. Now the boy wants to win the girl he fell in love with, but what he doesn't know is that the girl is a princess who is about to get engaged.
msg.Canal03Text: The God of Destruction wakes up and is dedicated to destroying with the planets, and ends up discovering the Earth. Goku warrior asks his friends for help in becoming the legendary Super Saiyan and facing the villain.
msg.Canal04Text: Naruto, a teenage ninja, dreams of becoming the Hokage of his village.
msg.Canal05Text: Thor's brother Loki gains access to the unlimited power of the cosmic cube by stealing it from within S.H.I.E.L.D. Nick Fury, the director of this international peacekeeping agency, soon brings together the only superheroes who will be able to defend Earth from unprecedented threats. Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Thor, Black Widow, and Archer Hawk make up Fury's dream team, but they must learn to set their egos aside and act as a group for humanity.
